title: Articles (a/an/the)
explanation: Use 'a' before consonant sounds, 'an' before vowel sounds, 'the' for specific things.
translation: Артикли - 'a' перед согласными, 'an' перед гласными, 'the' для конкретных предметов.

title: Prepositions
explanation: Time: at 5 PM, on Monday, in July. Place: at home, in the park, on the table.
examples: I will meet you at 5 PM
The book is on the table
translation: Предлоги - времени: at, on, in. Места: at, in, on.

title: Countable/Uncountable
explanation: Countable: books, apples. Uncountable: water, information. Use 'some' with uncountable.
translation: Исчисляемые: книги, яблоки. Неисчисляемые: вода, информация.

title: Adjectives Order
examples: beautiful big old round red Italian wooden dining table

title: Modal Verbs
translation: Модальные глаголы: can (способность), must (обязанность), should (совет), may (разрешение).

title: Question Words
explanation: Who (person), what (thing), where (place), when (time), why (reason), how (manner).
translation: Вопросительные слова: who (кто), what (что), where (где), when (когда), why (почему), how (как).

title: Plural Forms
explanation: Add -s: book-books. Add -es: box-boxes. Change -y to -ies: city-cities. Irregular: child-children.

title: Possessive Forms
explanation: Add 's for singular: John's book. Add ' for plural: students' books. Use 'of' for things: the color of the sky.
translation: Притяжательный падеж: 's для единственного числа, ' для множественного.

title: There is/are
explanation: Use 'there is' for singular, 'there are' for plural.
translation: There is для единственного числа, there are для множественного.
